ch.unibas.bsc.detapp.controller

Interface SensorDataConnector


  • public interface SensorDataConnector
    Simple interface to allow interaction with Android based code. It can be used to receive data which is originally stored as LiveData or within an Android room database.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.util.HashSet<java.lang.Integer> getAvailableSensorIds()
      Return the currently known sensor ids.
      SensorData[] getData()
      Get data as a SensorData object.
      boolean isConnected()
      Simple method to find out, whether a SmartSplint was and still is connected via BLE.
      void subscribeAll()
      Will subscribe to all available sensor ids currently known to the SensorManager.
      void subscribeAll(SimpleSensorListener sensorListener)
      Will subscribe to all available sensor ids currently known to the SensorManager with a custom listener which implements SimpleSensorListener.
      void subscribeToSensorId(int sensorId)
      Subscribe to a specific sensorId.
      void subscribeToSensorId(int sensorId, SimpleSensorListener sensorListener)
      Subscribe to a specific sensorId with a custom listener which implements SimpleSensorListener.
      void unsubscribeAll()
      Will unsubscribe from all available sensors currently known to the SensorManager.
      void unsubscribeFromSensor(int sensorId)
      Will unsubscribe from a given available sensor if currently known to the SensorManager.

    • Method Detail

      • getData

        SensorData[] getData()
        Get data as a SensorData object.

      • getAvailableSensorIds

        java.util.HashSet<java.lang.Integer> getAvailableSensorIds()
        Return the currently known sensor ids.
        Returns:
        HashSet of Integers which represent a sensor id.

      • subscribeAll

        void subscribeAll()
        Will subscribe to all available sensor ids currently known to the SensorManager.

      • subscribeAll

        void subscribeAll(SimpleSensorListener sensorListener)
        Will subscribe to all available sensor ids currently known to the SensorManager with a custom listener which implements SimpleSensorListener.

      • subscribeToSensorId

        void subscribeToSensorId(int sensorId)
        Subscribe to a specific sensorId. The method will first check whether this sensorId is available.
        Parameters:
        sensorId - Id of the sensor to subscribe to.
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if the sensor id is unknown.

      • subscribeToSensorId

        void subscribeToSensorId(int sensorId,
                         SimpleSensorListener sensorListener)
        Subscribe to a specific sensorId with a custom listener which implements SimpleSensorListener. The method will first check whether this sensorId is available.
        Parameters:
        sensorId - Id of the sensor to subscribe to.
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if the sensor id is unknown.

      • unsubscribeAll

        void unsubscribeAll()
        Will unsubscribe from all available sensors currently known to the SensorManager.

      • unsubscribeFromSensor

        void unsubscribeFromSensor(int sensorId)
        Will unsubscribe from a given available sensor if currently known to the SensorManager.
        Parameters:
        sensorId - the id of a sensor

      • isConnected

        boolean isConnected()
        Simple method to find out, whether a SmartSplint was and still is connected via BLE.
        Returns:
        True if BluetoothManger is connected otherwise false.
